item.title: Adding chat to PZ - No other guide can guide you so much, so fast, so thoroughly
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“bananaman, post:19, topic:455413”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=558314.msg4084433#msg4084433 date=1345672020]

Strange, that isn’t there, i have this

[code]/*
* Continuing a dialogue when the player clicks, “Click here to continue.”.
*/
public void continueDialogue() {

	/*
	 * Storing dialogueId's in arrays.
	 * - minOne: Dialogues that should decrease one ID.
	 * - plusOne: Dialogues that should increase one ID.
	 * - finishDias: Dialogues that should be finished.
	 */[/code]

When i add switch (NpcDialogue) { myself it says it cannot be resolved to a variable

Copy and paste my whole class I posted.

Then try. :s
[/quote]

Ok i’ve done that, the “case” now doesn’t come up as an error but the switch NpcDialogue does and it says the same thing :S[/quote]
Reinstall project Zeta. Cause other files probably have half of the things just like how your dialoguehandler did.

EDIT: Please follow the new tutorial. MUCH easier now and less code!
EDIT2: HUGE improvement to the tutorial. No other guide can guide you so much, so fast, and so thoroughly than this one.

Read full topic
